sys_ux_client_script.name: queryy

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_a05c8f0083cfd210cccd5d10feaad32c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">2d8affb283aada10cccd5d10feaad39a</macroponent><name>queryy</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ $sp, $data }) {
    // Get the selected states from the checkbox group
    const selectedStates = $data.filterStates || []; // Assuming 'filterStates' holds the selected values

    if (selectedStates.length > 0) {
        // Build the query dynamically for selected states
        const query = `stateIN${selectedStates.join(',')}`;
        // Update the Look Up Multiple Records data source with the query
        $sp.updateDataResource('lookUpMultipleRecords1', { filter: query });
    } else {
        // If no state is selected, show all offers
        $sp.updateDataResource('lookUpMultipleRecords1', { filter: '' });
    }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-01-07 19:04:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>a05c8f0083cfd210cccd5d10feaad32c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>queryy</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Automotive Service Management" source="x_1522458_automo_0">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Automotive Service Management">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a05c8f0083cfd210cccd5d10feaad32c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-01-07 19:04:08</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
